title: Texas halts truck inspections that caused border gridlock - The Associated Press
content:
1. Texas halts truck inspections that caused border gridlock  The Associated Press
  2. Gov. Abbott announces latest border security developments with Chihuahua, Mexico governor  KHOU 11
  3. RGV produce companies share economic impact of increased truck inspections  KVEO-TV

description: AUSTIN, Texas (AP) â€” Texas Gov. Greg Abbott on Friday repealed his traffic-clogging immigration order that backed up commercial trucks at the U.S.-Mexico border, after a week of intensifying backlash and fears of deepening economic losses.
